TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataKeyArray : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataKeyArray extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class DataKeyArray Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class DataKeyArray sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type DataKeyArray = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理 对象的集合。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects. 对象表示数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。A object represents the primary key of a record in a data-bound control. 通常，显示多个记录的数据绑定控件（如 控件）使用 对象来存储控件中显示的记录的 对象。In general, data-bound controls that display multiple records (such as the control) use a object to store the objects for the records displayed in the control. 类支持多种方法来访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用 索引器直接从集合中的特定的从零开始的索引检索 对象。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object from the collection at a specific zero-based index. - 使用 方法可以检索可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用 方法将集合中的项复制到数组中，该数组随后可用于访问集合中的项。Use the method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection. 若要确定集合中的总项数，请使用 属性。To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器检索 集合中的 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a object from a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问 集合。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/CS/DataKeyArraycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/VB/DataKeyArrayvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: array
param.span: 从零开始的 对象的数组，它从集合中接收复制的项。

span.span: A zero-based array of objects that receives the copied items from the collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 指定的数组中接收复制内容的第一个索引。

span.span: The first index in the specified array to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 将此集合中的所有项复制到 对象的指定数组（从数组中的指定索引位置开始）。

span.span: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified array of objects, starting at the specified index in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可从指定索引处开始，将集合中的项复制到指定的数组中。Use the method to copy the items from the collection into the specified array, starting at the specified index. 然后，该数组可用于访问集合中的项。The array can then be used to access the items in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 必须对 `array` 参数使用从零开始的数组。You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将 对象从 集合复制到 对象的数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from a collection to an array of objects. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定集合中的项数。Use the property to determine the number of items in the collection. 在循环访问集合时，通常使用 属性来确定其上限。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound. 属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。The property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定 集合是否为空。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a collection is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回一个包含集合中的所有 对象的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that contains all objects in the collection.

returns.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含集合中的所有 对象。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可获取一个枚举器，该枚举数可以线性循环访问以访问集合中的每个项。Use the method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the collection. 若要访问枚举器中当前位置的项，请使用 属性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要将枚举器移动到其初始位置，请使用 方法。To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 最初获取枚举器或使用 方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项时，必须调用 方法。When you initially get the enumerator or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否则， 属性表示的项是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问由 方法创建的枚举器。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through the enumerator created by the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以修改集合中的项。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the collection can be modified.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定是否可以修改 集合中的项。Use the property to determine whether the items in the collection can be modified. > [!NOTE] > 此属性已被重写以始终返回 `false`，以指示可以添加或删除 对象中的 对象。This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the objects in the object can be added or removed. 不能更改 对象本身。The objects themselves cannot be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean

summary.span: 获取指示 集合是否已同步(线程安全)的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 对象是否是线程安全的。Use the property to determine whether the object is thread safe. > [!NOTE] > 此属性已被重写，以始终返回 `false` 以指示 对象不是线程安全的。This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the object is not thread safe. 有关 属性的详细信息，请参阅 接口的 属性。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法被重写，以标记开始跟踪并将更改作为对象的视图状态的一部分保存到 对象的起始点。This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the object as part of the object's view state.
